import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row,Col, Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import{useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() //this is an static data later we will call our API nad load our data from database const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) //destructure properties from tour object const {photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour return ( <>

{title}
); }; export default TourDetails
